title: "Group 16"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
Animal <- read.csv(file = "dataset16.csv")
```

```{r}
Animal$year <- as.factor(Animal$year)
Animal$season <- ifelse(Animal$month %in% c(12, 1, 2), "Winter", Animal$month)
Animal$season <- ifelse(Animal$season %in% c(3, 4, 5), "Spring", Animal$season)
Animal$season <- ifelse(Animal$season %in% c(6, 7, 8), "Summer", Animal$season)
Animal$season <- ifelse(Animal$season %in% c(9, 10, 11), "Fall", Animal$season)
Animal$intake_type <- ifelse(Animal$intake_type == "STRAY", "Stray", "From Owner")
Animal$outcome_type <- ifelse(Animal$outcome_type %in% c("DIED", "EUTHANIZED"), "Dead", "Rehomed")
Animal$chip_status <- ifelse(Animal$chip_status == "SCAN CHIP", "Chip", "No Chip")
Animal <- subset(Animal, animal_type %in% c("CAT", "DOG"))
```

# EDA

```{r}
boxplot(Animal$time_at_shelter ~ Animal$animal_type)
```

```{r}
boxplot(Animal$time_at_shelter ~ Animal$season)
```

```{r}
boxplot(Animal$time_at_shelter ~ Animal$year)
```

```{r}
boxplot(Animal$time_at_shelter ~ Animal$intake_type)
```

```{r}
boxplot(Animal$time_at_shelter ~ Animal$outcome_type)
```

```{r}

```

```{r}
ggplot(Animal, aes(x=time_at_shelter)) + geom_density()
```
